name: cdBB [Coldfusion Driven Bulletin Board]
short_description: cdBB [Coldfusion Driven Bulletin Board] is an open-source message board written using technologies like Coldfusion, XML and Java. It goals to be a complete open source  enterprise solution for online communities.
